title.en: Prayer of Aspiration Incorporating the Eight Thoughts of Great Beings Who Follow the Way of the Mahāyāna

text.en: In time, may I eliminate all the sufferings
text.en-trans: dak ni nam zhik semchen tamche kyi

text.en: Of each and every living being!
text.en-trans: dukngal malü selwar ja nyam dang

text.en: In time, may I be able to bring those afflicted by poverty
text.en-trans: namzhik ulwé nyenpé semchen nam

text.en: To great wealth and affluence!
text.en-trans: jorwa chenpö né la jok nü nyam

text.en: May these aspirations be perfectly fulfilled without obstacle!
text.en-trans: dé zhin gekmé yongsu drub gyur chik

text.en: In time, may this body of flesh and blood
text.en-trans: namzhik sha trak dang ché lü di yi

text.en: Bring benefit to all living beings!
text.en-trans: semchen kun gyi dön ché nü na nyam

text.en: In time, even if I must remain for long within the hells,
text.en-trans: namzhik nyalwar yün ring né né kyang

text.en: May I be able to bring benefit to all sentient beings!
text.en-trans: semchen kun dön ché nü nyampa sok

text.en: May these aspirations be perfectly fulfilled without obstacle!
text.en-trans: dé zhin gekmé yongsu drub gyur chik

text.en: In time, with great worldly
text.en-trans: namzhik jikten dang ni jikten lé

text.en: And supramundane wealth,
text.en-trans: depé jorwa chenpö semchen gyi

text.en: May I be able to fulfil entirely the wishes of living beings!
text.en-trans: rewa yong su dzokpar ché nü nyam

text.en: May this aspiration be perfectly fulfilled without obstacle!
text.en-trans: dé zhin gekmé yongsu drub gyur chik

text.en: In time, having become awakened,
text.en-trans: namzhik sangyé nyi du gyur né ni

text.en: May I be able to deliver all beings from suffering!
text.en-trans: semchen kun gyi dukngal ngepa ru

text.en: May this come to pass without obstacle,
text.en-trans: jinpar ché nü nyam sok gekmé du

text.en: And bring unfathomable benefit and well-being!
text.en-trans: drub né dro dön pakmé jungwar shok

text.en: Being reborn in a way that brings no benefit to all,
text.en-trans: semchen kun la penpa mi chépé

text.en: Or relishing the experience of the ultimate, emptiness,
text.en-trans: kyewa dang ni döndam tongnyi kyi

text.en: So that the methods of the path are interrupted—
text.en-trans: ro la chö ching lam gyi tab gokpa

text.en: May skilful means and wisdom never part ways like this!
text.en-trans: dé sok tab shé ya dral ma gyur chik

text.en: Throughout all my lives,
text.en-trans: kyewo tamché tsimpar mi chépé

text.en: May I never take delight
text.en-trans: tsik dang zhen la penpar mi chépé

text.en: In words that fail to satisfy beings,
text.en-trans: tsowo dang ni lü dang sherab dang

text.en: Or in ways of life, physical forms, intelligence,
text.en-trans: nor dang wangchuk dang den zhen dak la

text.en: Wealth or power that fail to benefit others,
text.en-trans: nöpar chépa dak la ga chépa

text.en: Or in those who cause others harm.
text.en-trans: tserab kun tu dendra ma gyur chik

text.en: May all the results of all the negative actions of all sentient beings
text.en-trans: semchen kun gyi dikpé drebu kun

text.en: Ripen on me alone, and may all the results of my virtue
text.en-trans: dak la min ching dak gi gewé dré

text.en: Ripen on all living beings!
text.en-trans: drowa semchen kun la min gyur né

text.en: And may all these beings attain the fruition of the three buddha-kāyas!
text.en-trans: kun kyang ku sum drebu tobpar shok

text.en: Through the infallible truth of the supreme Three Jewels,
text.en-trans: chok sum denpa luwa mepa dang

text.en: And through the inconceivable force of love, compassion and jewel-like bodhicitta,
text.en-trans: jam dang nyingjé rinchen chang chub sem

text.en: As well as the two profound levels of truth,
text.en-trans: zabmö den nyi sam mi khyabpé tü

text.en: May this aspiration that is free from any selfish concern be fulfilled!
text.en-trans: rang dön dralwé mönlam drub gyur chik
